name: Embrace the Sun
description:
This is submitted for the "trans gal jam 3" (I'm a trans gal). It's more of a short story than a game.  My partner prompted me to write a story about love, so I did (very, very slowly).

This is my first game(ish creation) and my first creative story made for myself, so make if that what you will. It was fun and I'm glad I got to make it so queer.

Also please comment below if you know what an arroyo is. We are both desert dwellers, but they don't believe it's a common term.
